snippet: Dismayed at the thought of someone else settling her affairs without her input, a writer spent a year devising a detailed will that distributes her belongings to those dearest to her.
abstract: Laura M Holson Essay describes how she spent a year devising a detailed will that distributes her belongings to those dearest to her; expresses dismay at the thought of someone else settling her affairs without her input.
lead_paragraph: Dismayed at the thought of someone else settling her affairs without her input, a writer spent a year devising a detailed will that distributes her belongings to those dearest to her.

headline.print_headline: In Writing Her Will, It’s the Little Things That Matter
headline.seo: A Will That Remembers Friends, as Well as Family
headline.main: In Writing Her Will, It’s the Little Things That Matter
